content:
Scott Ritter: Iran sent a powerful message to Israel and the US last night

“Right now, Israeli military officials are looking at the damage done to their bases, and they understand the following: that Iran deliberately chose not to inflict extremely lethal action against Israel. That Iran struck buildings designed to send a signal to Israel, and indeed to the United States, that it could do what it did in Nevatim, at Ramona, anywhere in Israel, anywhere in the Middle East, and there was nothing the United States or Israel could do in response.”
